mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_RV_NO.CURRVAL AS rvNo FROM DUAL
insert into RESERVATION_TBL values (SEQ_RV_NO.NEXTVAL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_RV_DISCHARGE_NO.NEXTVAL, 8, '0'), #{userNo}, #{cityNo}, #{districtNo}, #{rvAddr}, #{rvPhone}, #{rvRequest}, #{rvName}, #{rvAddrDetail}, DEFAULT, #{rvRvDate}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)

SELECT SEQ_RV_DETAIL_NO.CURRVAL AS rvNo FROM DUAL
insert into RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL values ( SEQ_RV_DETAIL_NO.NEXTVAL, #{rvNo}, #{rvDetailTotal}, #{rvDetailFee} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION_TBL SET IS_RV_COMPLETION = 'Y' WHERE RV_NO = #{rvNo}
mapper.select: select * from WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL JOIN WASTE_TYPE_TBL USING (WASTE_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN WASTE_INFO_TBL USING (WASTE_TYPE_NO) where WASTE_CATEGORY_NAME=#{wasteCategoryName}
select * from WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL
select * from WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL JOIN WASTE_TYPE_TBL USING (WASTE_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN WASTE_INFO_TBL USING (WASTE_TYPE_NO) where WASTE_INFO_NO=#{value}
SELECT MAX(RV_DETAIL_NO) FROM RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL
select IMAGE_NO from IMAGE_TBL where IMAGE_RENAME = #{value}

select * from WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL join WASTE_TYPE_TBL using (WASTE_CATEGORY_NO) join WASTE_INFO_TBL using (WASTE_TYPE_NO) join RV_CONNECTION_TBL using (WASTE_INFO_NO) join IMAGE_TBL using (IMAGE_NO) join RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL using (RV_DETAIL_NO) join RESERVATION_TBL using (RV_NO) join PAY_TBL using (RV_DETAIL_NO) where PAY_ID = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_TBL WHERE IS_RV_COMPLETION = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_TBL WHERE IS_RV_COMPLETION = 'N'

SELECT r.RV_NO, r.RV_NAME, r.RV_ADDR, d.DISTRICT_NAME, r.RV_APPLICATION_DATE, r.RV_RV_DATE, p.IS_PAY_STATUS, r.IS_RV_COMPLETION, re.REGION_NO FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN DISTRICT_TBL d ON r.DISTRICT_NO = d.DISTRICT_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_TBL p ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = p.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN REGION_TBL re ON r.DISTRICT_NO = re.DISTRICT_NO ORDER BY r.RV_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_TBL

SELECT r.RV_NO, r.RV_DISCHARGE_NO, r.RV_NAME, r.RV_ADDR, u.USER_ID, d.DISTRICT_NAME, r.RV_RV_DATE , p.IS_PAY_STATUS, p.PAY_AMOUNT, r.RV_REQUEST, r.RV_ADDR_DETAIL, r.RV_APPLICATION_DATE, r.IS_RV_COMPLETION , wt.WASTE_TYPE_NAME, wc.WASTE_CATEGORY_NAME, wi.WASTE_INFO_STANDARD, wi.WASTE_INFO_FEE, r.RV_PHONE , i.IMAGE_RENAME, i.IMAGE_PATH FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN USER_TBL u ON r.USER_NO = u.USER_NO JOIN DISTRICT_TBL d ON r.DISTRICT_NO = d.DISTRICT_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_TBL p ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = p.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN RV_CONNECTION_TBL c ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = c.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN WASTE_INFO_TBL wi ON c.WASTE_INFO_NO = wi.WASTE_INFO_NO LEFT JOIN WASTE_TYPE_TBL wt ON wi.WASTE_TYPE_NO = wt.WASTE_TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL wc ON wt.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO = wc.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN IMAGE_TBL i ON c.IMAGE_NO = i.IMAGE_NO WHERE r.RV_NO = #{rvNo}

SELECT r.RV_NO, r.RV_NAME, r.RV_ADDR, d.DISTRICT_NAME, r.RV_APPLICATION_DATE, r.RV_RV_DATE, p.IS_PAY_STATUS, r.IS_RV_COMPLETION, re.REGION_NO FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN DISTRICT_TBL d ON r.DISTRICT_NO = d.DISTRICT_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_TBL p ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = p.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN REGION_TBL re ON r.DISTRICT_NO = re.DISTRICT_NO WHERE re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo} ORDER BY r.RV_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN DISTRICT_TBL d ON r.DISTRICT_NO = d.DISTRICT_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_TBL p ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = p.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN REGION_TBL re ON r.DISTRICT_NO = re.DISTRICT_NO WHERE re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN DISTRICT_TBL d ON r.DISTRICT_NO = d.DISTRICT_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_TBL p ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = p.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN REGION_TBL re ON r.DISTRICT_NO = re.DISTRICT_NO WHERE r.IS_RV_COMPLETION = 'Y' AND re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN DISTRICT_TBL d ON r.DISTRICT_NO = d.DISTRICT_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_TBL p ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = p.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN REGION_TBL re ON r.DISTRICT_NO = re.DISTRICT_NO WHERE r.IS_RV_COMPLETION = 'N' AND re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo}

SELECT r.RV_NO, r.RV_NAME, r.RV_ADDR, d.DISTRICT_NAME, r.RV_APPLICATION_DATE, r.RV_RV_DATE, p.IS_PAY_STATUS, r.IS_RV_COMPLETION, re.REGION_NO FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN DISTRICT_TBL d ON r.DISTRICT_NO = d.DISTRICT_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_TBL p ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = p.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN REGION_TBL re ON r.DISTRICT_NO = re.DISTRICT_NO
WHERE d.DISTRICT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE TRUNC(r.RV_APPLICATION_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{searchKeyword}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE TRUNC(r.RV_RV_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{searchKeyword}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE r.IS_RV_COMPLETION LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY r.RV_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN DISTRICT_TBL d ON r.DISTRICT_NO = d.DISTRICT_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_TBL p ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = p.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN REGION_TBL re ON r.DISTRICT_NO = re.DISTRICT_NO
WHERE d.DISTRICT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE TRUNC(r.RV_APPLICATION_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{searchKeyword}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE TRUNC(r.RV_RV_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{searchKeyword}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE r.IS_RV_COMPLETION LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY r.RV_NO DESC
SELECT IMAGE_NO FROM IMAGE_TBL where IMAGE_RENAME = #{value}

select WASTE_CATEGORY_NAME, WASTE_TYPE_NAME, WASTE_INFO_STANDARD, RV_DISCHARGE_NO, RV_ADDR, RV_RV_DATE, RV_DETAIL_FEE from WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL join WASTE_TYPE_TBL using (WASTE_CATEGORY_NO) join WASTE_INFO_TBL using (WASTE_TYPE_NO) join RV_CONNECTION_TBL using (WASTE_INFO_NO) join IMAGE_TBL using (IMAGE_NO) join RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL using (RV_DETAIL_NO) join RESERVATION_TBL using (RV_NO) join PAY_TBL using (RV_DETAIL_NO) where PAY_ID = #{payId}

SELECT g.RV_DISCHARGE_NO, MIN(a.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO) as WASTE_CATEGORY_NO, MIN(a.WASTE_CATEGORY_NAME) as WASTE_CATEGORY_NAME, MIN(b.WASTE_TYPE_NO) as WASTE_TYPE_NO, MIN(b.WASTE_TYPE_NAME) as WASTE_TYPE_NAME, MIN(c.WASTE_INFO_NO) as WASTE_INFO_NO, MIN(c.WASTE_INFO_STANDARD) as WASTE_INFO_STANDARD, MIN(c.WASTE_INFO_FEE) as WASTE_INFO_FEE, MIN(g.RV_NO) as RV_NO, MIN(g.USER_NO) as USER_NO, MIN(g.CITY_NO) as CITY_NO, MIN(g.DISTRICT_NO) as DISTRICT_NO, MIN(g.RV_ADDR) as RV_ADDR, MIN(g.RV_PHONE) as RV_PHONE, MIN(g.RV_REQUEST) as RV_REQUEST, MIN(g.RV_NAME) as RV_NAME, MIN(g.RV_ADDR_DETAIL) as RV_ADDR_DETAIL, MIN(g.RV_APPLICATION_DATE) as RV_APPLICATION_DATE, MIN(g.RV_RV_DATE) as RV_RV_DATE, MIN(g.IS_RV_COMPLETION) as IS_RV_COMPLETION, MIN(g.IS_RV_CANCEL) as IS_RV_CANCEL, MIN(d.RV_DETAIL_NO) as RV_DETAIL_NO, MIN(f.RV_DETAIL_TOTAL) as RV_DETAIL_TOTAL, MIN(f.RV_DETAIL_FEE) as RV_DETAIL_FEE, MIN(d.RV_CONNECTION_NO) as RV_CONNECTION_NO, MIN(d.WASTE_INFO_NO) as WASTE_INFO_NO, MIN(e.IMAGE_NO) as IMAGE_NO, MIN(d.IMAGE_INDEX_NO) as IMAGE_INDEX_NO, MIN(h.PAY_NO) as PAY_NO, MIN(h.USER_ID) as USER_ID, MIN(h.PAY_ID) as PAY_ID, MIN(h.PAY_METHOD) as PAY_METHOD, MIN(h.PAY_AMOUNT) as PAY_AMOUNT, MIN(h.PAY_CURRENCY) as PAY_CURRENCY, MIN(h.PAY_DATE) as PAY_DATE, MIN(h.IS_PAY_STATUS) as IS_PAY_STATUS, MIN(h.IS_PAY_CANCEL) as IS_PAY_CANCEL, MIN(e.IMAGE_NO) as IMAGE_NO, MIN(e.IMAGE_GROUP_NO) as IMAGE_GROUP_NO, MIN(e.IMAGE_NAME) as IMAGE_NAME, MIN(e.IMAGE_RENAME) as IMAGE_RENAME, MIN(e.IMAGE_PATH) as IMAGE_PATH FROM WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL a JOIN WASTE_TYPE_TBL b ON a.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO = b.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO JOIN WASTE_INFO_TBL c ON b.WASTE_TYPE_NO = c.WASTE_TYPE_NO JOIN RV_CONNECTION_TBL d ON c.WASTE_INFO_NO = d.WASTE_INFO_NO JOIN IMAGE_TBL e ON d.IMAGE_NO = e.IMAGE_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL f ON d.RV_DETAIL_NO = f.RV_DETAIL_NO JOIN RESERVATION_TBL g ON f.RV_NO = g.RV_NO JOIN PAY_TBL h ON f.RV_DETAIL_NO = h.RV_DETAIL_NO WHERE g.USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY g.RV_DISCHARGE_NO, e.IMAGE_GROUP_NO ORDER BY g.RV_DISCHARGE_NO DESC
select * from WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL JOIN WASTE_TYPE_TBL USING (WASTE_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN WASTE_INFO_TBL USING (WASTE_TYPE_NO)

SELECT * FROM WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL join WASTE_TYPE_TBL using (WASTE_CATEGORY_NO) join WASTE_INFO_TBL using (WASTE_TYPE_NO) join RV_CONNECTION_TBL using (WASTE_INFO_NO) join IMAGE_TBL using (IMAGE_NO) join RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL using (RV_DETAIL_NO) join RESERVATION_TBL using (RV_NO) join PAY_TBL using (RV_DETAIL_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY RV_NO DESC
select * from PAY_TBL where PAY_ID = #{value}
select * from RESERVATION_TBL where RV_NO = #{rvNo}
select * from RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL where RV_DETAIL_NO = #{RvDetailNo}
select PAY_ID from RESERVATION_TBL join RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL USING (RV_NO) join PAY_TBL USING (RV_DETAIL_NO) where RV_DISCHARGE_NO = #{dischargeNo}

select * from WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL join WASTE_TYPE_TBL using (WASTE_CATEGORY_NO) join WASTE_INFO_TBL using (WASTE_TYPE_NO) join RV_CONNECTION_TBL using (WASTE_INFO_NO) join IMAGE_TBL using (IMAGE_NO) join RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL using (RV_DETAIL_NO) join RESERVATION_TBL using (RV_NO) join PAY_TBL using (RV_DETAIL_NO) where RV_NO = #{rvNo}

SELECT r.RV_NO, r.RV_NAME, r.RV_ADDR, d.DISTRICT_NAME, r.RV_APPLICATION_DATE, r.RV_RV_DATE, p.IS_PAY_STATUS, r.IS_RV_COMPLETION, re.REGION_NO FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN DISTRICT_TBL d ON r.DISTRICT_NO = d.DISTRICT_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_TBL p ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = p.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN REGION_TBL re ON r.DISTRICT_NO = re.DISTRICT_NO
WHERE re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo} AND r.RV_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo} AND TRUNC(r.RV_APPLICATION_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{searchKeyword}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo} AND TRUNC(r.RV_RV_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{searchKeyword}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo} AND r.IS_RV_COMPLETION LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY r.RV_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN DISTRICT_TBL d ON r.DISTRICT_NO = d.DISTRICT_NO JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL rd ON r.RV_NO = rd.RV_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_TBL p ON rd.RV_DETAIL_NO = p.RV_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN REGION_TBL re ON r.DISTRICT_NO = re.DISTRICT_NO
WHERE re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo} AND r.RV_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo} AND TRUNC(r.RV_APPLICATION_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{searchKeyword}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo} AND TRUNC(r.RV_RV_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{searchKeyword}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE re.REGION_NO = #{regionNo} AND r.IS_RV_COMPLETION LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY r.RV_NO DESC

select * from WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL a join WASTE_TYPE_TBL b on a.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO = b.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO join WASTE_INFO_TBL c on b.WASTE_TYPE_NO = c.WASTE_TYPE_NO join RV_CONNECTION_TBL d on c.WASTE_INFO_NO = d.WASTE_INFO_NO join IMAGE_TBL e on d.IMAGE_NO = e.IMAGE_NO join RESERVATION_DETAIL_TBL f on d.RV_DETAIL_NO = f.RV_DETAIL_NO join RESERVATION_TBL g on g.RV_NO = f.RV_NO join PAY_TBL h on h.RV_DETAIL_NO = f.RV_DETAIL_NO where d.IMAGE_INDEX_NO = #{imageIndexNo} and d.RV_DETAIL_NO = #{rvDetailNo}
